languages.text:
The psyber-raven gains +40 Willpower.
Whenever it {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a psychic power, the Overseer gains +{uip|MP|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7} MP. Whenever an attacking psychic power is {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g}, the next {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} attacking psychic power has its damage increased by +{uip|Damage|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7}%.

Cada vez que {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} gana +{uip|MP|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Cada vez que se {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} un poder psíquico ofensivo, el daño del próximo poder psíquico ofensivo {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmitido{/g} aumenta en un +{uip|Damage|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7} %.

languages.text:
生化渡鸦的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高40点。
每当生化渡鸦{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}都会获得{uip|MP|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。每当生化渡鸦{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}攻击性灵能能力时，下一个{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}的攻击性灵能能力造成的伤害都会提高{uip|Damage|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7}%。

Chaque fois qu'elle {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relaie{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g}, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} gagne +{uip|MP|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. Chaque fois qu'un pouvoir psychique offensif est {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayé{/g}, les dégâts du prochain pouvoir psychique offensif {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayé{/g} sont augmentés de +{uip|Damage|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7} %.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継ぐ{/g}とき、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+{uip|MP|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7}される。超能力の攻撃を{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継ぐ{/g}とき、次に{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれた{/g}超能力の攻撃のダメージは+{uip|Damage|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7}%増加する。

監督者が超能力を{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継ぐ{/g}とき、MPが+{uip|MP|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7}される。超能力の攻撃を{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継ぐ{/g}とき、次に{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれた{/g}超能力の攻撃のダメージは+{uip|Damage|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7}%増加する。

languages.text:
Псайберворон получает +40 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}.
Когда он {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслирует{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} получает +{uip|MP|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. После {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретрансляции{/g} атакующей психосилы урон от следующей {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслируемой{/g} атакующей психосилы увеличивается на {uip|Damage|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7}%.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +40 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Whenever it {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains +{uip|MP|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Whenever an attacking psychic power is {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g}, the damage of the next {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} attacking psychic power is increased by +{uip|Damage|4c948aef7d49439dab9a3cb033b991d7}%.
